-- This script was generated by the ERD tool in pgAdmin 4.
-- Please log an issue at https://redmine.postgresql.org/projects/pgadmin4/issues/new if you find any bugs, including reproduction steps.
-- 
-- # To delete all data
-- Truncate table "AZCs"
-- CASCADE
BEGIN;


CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public."AZCs"
(
    id serial,
    "AZC_Name" text,
    "AZC_Link" text,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public."Location_Details"
(
    id serial,
    postal_code text,
    house_number text,
    location_manager text,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public."Location_Details"
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (id)
    REFERENCES public."AZCs" (id) MATCH SIMPLE
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    NOT VALID;

END;
